Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: LAV1128
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A wheeled assault gun armed with a tank cannon, the LAV1128 is designed to provide fire support for troops. High speed in all terrain and all sides armored means that it is very effective in hit and run tactics.

It has good fuel efficiency but is quite visible.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
